column4: Hiya, can someone tell me how to watch youtube videos nicely with utumbu, this system has terrible lag and picture freezes
flash works fine in ubuntu installs, and youtube playback is fine.  You'll have to give us some more details if you want us to help you isolate the problem.
again, I can't help you unless you give me something to work with
what video card are you using
and have you installed correct drivers for it (probably from the restricted drivers manager)
open up a terminal and type "glxinfo | grep -i direct"
ok, so your video card id sest up correctly
if you turn off desktop effects, do you still get the same general lagginess?
open up a terminal and type top
and identify the process that is running out of control
what happens if you close firefox?
does the machine behave correctly for the most part?
maybe the out of the box ubuntu install is like that, but you can configure it to be as slim as you want.  Ubuntu is built on top of a base system that I've had running on a 486 with 4mb ram
it x-chat is using that much cpu, it's probably having a bad interaction with something.  Have you tried turning off desktop effects?
Xorg is the process responsible for your gui
